oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: A Man's Best Friend
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Woodcuts (prints); show tents;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (blue and black on white) announcing A Man's Best Friend at the Undermain Theater on February 15- March 15. Poster features woodcuts of a circus scene and a clown.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mike McIntyre
